reviewText: Of these three movies I like the first Scary Movie since it's a knock off of the original Scream movies which is funny. Scary Movie 2 is somewhat gross since everyone act like there sick and vomit.  Scary Movie 3 is another good movie which is funny and good to watch.
summary: Scary Movie Triple Pack(Scary Movie/Scary Movie 2/Scary Movie 3)
Title: Scary Movie Triple Pack: (Scary Movie / Scary Movie 2 / Scary Movie 3)

reviewText: These 3 movie are good one to get if you like funny monster movies and Leslie Nelson. this is for any fan of the movie.
Title: Scary Movie Triple Pack: (Scary Movie / Scary Movie 2 / Scary Movie 3)

reviewText: Three movies in one can not beat this deal if you liked the scary movies. Their corny,crazy with a lot of laughs. Their spin offs of a mixture of other movies made fun off in each one enjoy.
Title: Scary Movie Triple Pack: (Scary Movie / Scary Movie 2 / Scary Movie 3)

reviewText: I love the spoofs of Scary Movie.  I am a big fan, so I had to have this one.  I love it, and highly recommend it.  I like buying the DVDs for all of the special additions (bloopers, etc).
Title: Scary Movie Triple Pack: (Scary Movie / Scary Movie 2 / Scary Movie 3)

reviewText: it was good and number 3.5 was funny i did not know that i was going to get that with it and it was the best gift to give
Title: Scary Movie Triple Pack: (Scary Movie / Scary Movie 2 / Scary Movie 3)
